alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Todd, western Mellette, southeastern Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 715 PM MDT/815 PM CDT/... At 628 PM MDT/728 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Corn Creek to 4 miles west of Black Pipe to 7 miles northwest of Upper Cut Meat. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parmelee, Norris, Cedar Butte, Upper Cut Meat, He Dog, Black Pipe, Corn Creek and northwestern Rosebud Reservation. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 166 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
